alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 28 at 11:09AM PDT until May 29 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL 2 AM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Downslope west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes and Owens Valley. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 2 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winds will make driving difficult for large trucks... motorcycles...trailers and campers. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Lofted dust could reduce visibilities on roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest crosswinds on Highway 395 are expected south of Olancha.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County; Owens Valley
